name: Fateless Challenge [minijam 83]
description:
This is my minijam 83 entry.

Locked in a claustrophobic dungeon square, you have to survive a grueling 6 rounds of combat against the dungeons' finest. Namely a bunch of kobolds.

While that might not necessarily sound intimidating, it's not really about them, so much as it is about your relationship with the lady of fortune.

This game can either be unfairly difficult or unbelievably easy depending on your luck or adaptability to handling very limited free space.

This is what I could afford to create in about 3 days I guess.

Controls

W/Up Arrow/D Pad Up/Left Stick Up - Move up

S/Down Arrow/D Pad Down/Left Stick Down - Move down

A/Left Arrow/D Pad Left/Left Stick Left - Move left

D/Right Arrow/D Pad Right/Left Stick Right - Move right

F/Xbox A - Attack

Space/Xbox B - Dash

Modifiers

healed - Heals you to max health

These two can cancel each other out!

strong - doubles your attack power

weak   - halves your attack power

Do note, this does not affect the speed from dashing!

quick - doubles your speed

slow  - halves your speed

vampire - any enemy that dies be it your cause or through the holes, will restore 2 points of health.

confused - inverts your directional controls (left = right, right = left, etc).

warrior - doubles your strength and halves your constitution. (This is different than how the strong modifier directly changes your damage output!)
